document.full_text: reuniting was the easy part for chauncey billups, amar'e stoudemire and carmelo anthony. staying together, at least for any meaningful span, proved much more challenging.
document.title: pacers 106, knicks 93: billups returns, but rhythm goes absent
lines_and_colors: reuniting was the easy part for chauncey billups, amar'e stoudemire and carmelo anthony. staying together, at least for any meaningful span, proved much more challenging.
